sentences.english: In truth, the role was written specifically as non-Asian.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這個角色是專門爲非亞裔演員而寫的。

sentences.english: Celebrating the spiritual and cultural life of Canada's South Asian community.
sentences.chinese: 宣傳加拿大南亞裔社區的精神文化生活。

sentences.english: Do you ask Asian guys the same question?
sentences.chinese: 你會問亞裔男性這樣的問題嗎？

sentences.english: The upshot, the brief said, was discrimination against Asian students.
sentences.chinese: 結果，該報告稱，這造成了對亞裔學生的歧視。

sentences.english: I think the percentage of authoritarian households was highest in Asian-Americans.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，在亞裔美國人當中，專制家庭的比例最高。

sentences.english: Chinese and Indians form the bulk of the Asian scientists.
sentences.chinese: 亞裔科學家以華族和印族爲主。

sentences.english: Asian Americans enjoy a high socioeconomic status, are well educated and are healthy.
sentences.chinese: 亞裔美國人均享有高社經地位及良好的教育和健康。

sentences.english: I am sure there is no shortage of Asian nail techs. in US.
sentences.chinese: 我很確定修甲業不缺亞裔員工。

sentences.english: Racial slurs, racial jokes, all having to do with being Asian.
sentences.chinese: 種族主義辱罵，種族笑話，都是跟亞裔有關的。

sentences.english: A female Asian-American police officer was among the security personnel assigned to the area.
sentences.chinese: 在場的安全人員中，有一位女性的亞裔美國警官。

sentences.english: Is there a name for Asian women who like white guys?
sentences.chinese: 對喜歡白人男性的亞裔女性有沒有什麼雅稱？

sentences.english: Asian-American students have challenged Ivy League admission policies before.
sentences.chinese: 此前亞裔學生也曾挑戰過常春藤盟校的招生政策。
因爲東方人和亞裔美國人。

sentences.english: Fashion became one of the few outlets for Asian-Americans who wanted to put their name out there.
sentences.chinese: 時尚業成爲那些想要出名的亞裔人的少數出路之一。

sentences.english: The Americans of assai -descent, have made outstanding contributions to the USA.
sentences.chinese: 亞裔美國人對美國作出了傑出的貢獻。

sentences.english: Elaine Kim, professor of Asian American studies, University of California, Berkeley.
sentences.chinese: 金惠經，亞裔美國文學研究教授，加州大學，伯克利。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
Chinatown/also called 唐人街[Tang2 ren2 jie1]
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
